item.title: The Fundamentals: Give a Damn about Binary
item.description: Welcome Back Ladies and Gents! Welcome back to The Fundamentals blog series. Where we have a conversation about technology concepts in a non-intimidating fashion. The ultimate goal? To lower the barrier to entry to the technology industry, and inspire technology craftspeople of the future. If you haven’t read the the fundamentals introduction post, feel free to give it a skim Before Reading Today we will be using Python as our programming language of choice to work through examples and help us learn!
